Govinda's Health Food - Govinda offers sweet alternatives to candy that do not contain any artificial flavours or other artificial ingredients. According to Ayurveda, these sweets balance the doshas and are safe for any gourmets! The Cocoa: - The carefully fermented and slightly roasted cocoa beans are gently broken up and gently processed in a patented process. All ingredients are checked for their quality. During production, no heat is added, so that the valuable ingredients of the cocoa bean are fully preserved. Raw Cocoa - Cocoa beans contain important bitter substances, are rich in antioxidants, iron, magnesium and zinc. Their protein and carbohydrates make up the nutritional value of the cocoa bean.
